definitions.meaning: 属于个人或特定群体，不公开的
definitions.usage: 形容某事物仅限于个人、家庭或特定群体，不对外公开或与公众无关，常用于描述空间、财产、事务或信息。

examples.scene: 张伟在公司忙碌一天后，回到家想独自放松。他关上门，打开音乐，享受属于自己的时光。
examples.chineseIdea: 张伟希望有一个不被打扰的个人空间，远离工作和社交的压力。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: He values his @ @ highly and keeps it separate from his work.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: He values his 「private life」 highly and keeps it separate from his work.
examples.chineseTranslation: 他非常重视自己的「私人生活」，并将其与工作分开。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'He very cares his personal life.' 纠正：'He values his private life highly.'（'cares' 不够正式，'personal life' 虽可，但 'private life' 更常见且地道。）

examples.scene: 李梅在咖啡馆与朋友聊天，话题涉及她的家庭问题。她压低声音，确保旁人听不到。
examples.chineseIdea: 李梅希望讨论敏感话题时不被外人听见，保持对话的私密性。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: They had a @ @ to avoid being overheard.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: They had a 「private conversation」 to avoid being overheard.
examples.chineseTranslation: 他们进行了一次「私人谈话」，以免被别人听到。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'They talked in a secret way.' 纠正：'They had a private conversation.'（'secret' 暗示隐秘或机密，'private' 更适合描述非公开的对话。）

definitions.usage: 指由个人或非政府实体拥有或运营的机构、组织或企业，通常与公共部门相对。

examples.scene: 王强正在选择一所学校给他的孩子。他听说一所私立学校教学质量很高，但学费昂贵。
examples.chineseIdea: 王强希望孩子接受更好的教育，考虑私立学校，尽管成本较高。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: He considered sending his child to a @ @ for better education.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: He considered sending his child to a 「private school」 for better education.
examples.chineseTranslation: 他考虑送孩子去一所「私立学校」以获得更好的教育。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'He wants his child to study in a private school for good study.' 纠正：'He considered sending his child to a private school for better education.'（'good study' 不自然，'better education' 更准确。）

examples.scene: 陈女士需要做一个小手术。她选择了一家私立医院，因为服务更个性化，等待时间短。
examples.chineseIdea: 陈女士希望得到更高质量的医疗服务，愿意支付私立医院的费用。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: She chose a @ @ for faster and more personalized care.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: She chose a 「private hospital」 for faster and more personalized care.
examples.chineseTranslation: 她选择了一家「私立医院」，以获得更快、更个性化的护理。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'She went to a private hospital for good service.' 纠正：'She chose a private hospital for faster and more personalized care.'（'good service' 过于笼统，'faster and more personalized care' 更具体。）

definitions.meaning: 个人的，私下的（情感或行为）
definitions.usage: 描述某人的情感、想法或行为是私密的，通常不轻易与他人分享。

examples.scene: 林娜在日记中记录自己的内心想法，从不让别人看。她觉得这些想法是属于自己的。
examples.chineseIdea: 林娜认为她的内心世界是私密的，不希望与他人分享。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: She keeps her @ @ to herself and never shares them.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: She keeps her 「private thoughts」 to herself and never shares them.
examples.chineseTranslation: 她把自己的「私人想法」留给自己，从不与人分享。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'She doesn’t tell her inside thoughts.' 纠正：'She keeps her private thoughts to herself.'（'inside thoughts' 不地道，'private thoughts' 更自然。）

examples.scene: 赵磊的同事问他为什么最近情绪低落，但他不想多说，只是说这是个人问题。
examples.chineseIdea: 赵磊不想公开讨论自己的情感问题，希望保持隐私。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: He said it was a @ @ and didn’t want to discuss it.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: He said it was a 「private matter」 and didn’t want to discuss it.
examples.chineseTranslation: 他说这是一个「私人事务」，不想讨论。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'He said it’s his own thing.' 纠正：'He said it was a private matter.'（'own thing' 过于口语化且模糊，'private matter' 更正式且清晰。）
